message.name: ERR_ENT_CONTACTLOGCONCERN_XRV_EXISTS
message.locale: A concern "%1s" already exists for this contact log.

message.name: ERR_ENT_CONTACTLOGCONCERN_FV_EMPTY
message.locale: Concern role must be specified as a meeting concern.

message.name: ERR_ENT_CONTACTLOGCONCERN_IS_DUPLICATE
message.locale: A participant that has been marked as a duplicate cannot be added as a concern.
